This is the best game ever.
Highly recommended if you like FPS games!

I have played Counter-Strike games for a long time. Still one of my absolute favorites. All about teamplay: communications, timing, rotations, utility etc. Absolutely recommended for any hardcore fps fans!

I guess I have to mention at least one downside: there are a lot of toxic people within this community. Do your best not to be one. This way you will do your part of making sure that everyone get the gaming experience they deserve. Train hard and enjoy!
